mapper.insert: insert into exam_cla (id, exam_id, department_id, major_id, cla_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{claId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
